name: Missione Odessa
overview: A Jackson Soft text adventure in Italian about finding and stopping the Nazi "rat-lines" of escape from Germany to Argentina and Brazil following World War II. The name ODESSA is an acronym for the German phrase "Organization der ehemaligen SS-Angehörigen", which translates as "Organization of Former Members of the SS". An English translation was released in 2016 by the same author.
